name: Notes
subtitle: Loose fragments and scribbles
content: A few scrawled lines about errands and a name halfâ€‘remembered.
Ink smudges where something was crossed out hastily.

name: Locked Document
subtitle: Unreadable encryption
content: The text is scrambled beyond recognition.
Symbols repeat in patterns that feel intentional but indecipherable.
Whatever this once was, it is no longer accessible.

name: Missing File
subtitle: Listed but not present
content: This entry exists only as a reference.
